definition: pityriasis versicolor (aka tinea versicolor), blotchy skin condition common in tropical areas, common name 汗斑
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: To observe clinical observation on the treatment of tinea versicolor with Quxuan medicinal liquor.
sentences.chinese: 觀察自制中藥祛癬方治療花斑癬的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect and safety of 2% ketoconazole lotions in the treatment of tinea versicolor.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察2%酮康唑洗劑治療花斑癬的療效及安全性。

sentences.english: Skin biopsies from lesions resembling pityriasis versicolor showed characteristics of human papillomavirus infection.
sentences.chinese: 花斑癬狀病竈之組織病理檢查呈典型病毒感染表現。
